maqras.text: 76|19|Ara tadera upara pradaksina karabe cira kisoragana, yakhana apani taderake dekhabena takhana mane karabena tara yena biksipta mukta.
76|20|Ara apani yakhana sekhane dekhabena, dekhate pabena sbacchandya ebam bisala rajya.
76|21|Tadera abarana habe suksma sabuja resama o sthula resama, ara tara alankrta habe raupya nirmita kankane [1], ara tadera raba taderake pana karabena pabitra paniya.
76|22|‘Niscaya eta tomadera puraskara; ara tomadera karmapracesta chila prasansayogya.
76|23|Niscaya amara apanara prati kura'ana nayila karechi krame krame.
76|24|Kaje'i apani dhairyera sathe apanara rabera nirdesera pratiksa karuna ebam tadera madhya theke kono papistha ba ghora akrtajna kaphirera anugatya karabena na.
76|25|Ara apanara rabera nama smarana karuna sakale o sandhyaya.
76|26|Ara ratera kichu anse tamra prati sajdabanata hona ara ratera dirgha samaya tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna.
76|27|Niscaya tara bhalabase duniyara jibanake ara tara tadera samanera kathina dinake upeksa kare cale [1].
76|28|Amara taderake srsti karechi ebam tadera gathana sudrrha karechi. Ara amara yakhana icche karaba tadera sthane tadera mata (ka'uke) diye paribartana kare deba [1].
76|29|Niscaya eta eka upadesa, ata'eba ye icche kare se yena tara rabera dike ekati patha grahana kare.
76|30|Ara tomara icche karate saksama habe na yadi na allah icche karena. Niscaya allah sarbajna, prajnamaya.
76|31|Tini yake icche tamra anugrahera antarbhukta karena, kintu yalemara- tadera jan'ya tini prastuta rekhechena yantranadayaka sasti.
77|1|Sapatha kalyanasbarupa prerita bayura
77|2|atahpara pralayankari jhatikara
77|3|sapatha pracanda sancalanakarira
77|4|atahpara suspastarupe parthakyakarira
77|5|atahpara tadera, yara manusera antare paumche deya upadesa--- [1]
77|6|oyara-apatti rahitakarana o satarka karara jan'ya [1]
77|7|Niscaya tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta abasyambhabi.
77|8|Yakhana naksatrarajira alo nirbapita kara habe
77|9|ara yakhana akasa bidirna kara habe
77|10|ara yakhana parbatamala curnabicurna kara habe
77|11|ara yakhana rasulaganake nirdharita samaye upasthita kara habe [1]
77|12|esaba sthagita rakha hayeche kon dinera jan'ya
77|13|bicara dinera jan'ya.
77|14|Ara apanake kise janabe bicara dina ki
77|15|sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya [1].
77|16|Amara ki purbabartiderake dhbansa karini
77|17|tarapara amara parabartiderake tadera anugami karaba [1].
77|18|Aparadhidera prati amara erupa'i kare thaki.
77|19|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|20|Amara ki tomaderake tuccha pani hate srsti karini
77|21|tarapara amara ta rekhechi nirapada adhare [1]
77|22|eka nirdista kala paryanta
77|23|atahpara amara parimapa karechi, sutaram amara kata nipuna parimapakari [1]
77|24|sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya [1].
77|25|Amara ki yaminake srsti karini dharanakarirupe
77|26|jibita o mrtera jan'ya [1]
77|27|ara amara tate sthapana karechi sudrrha ucca parbatamala ebam tomaderake pana kariyechi supeya pani [1].
77|28|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya [1].
77|29|Tomara yate mithyaropa karate, cala tara'i dike.
77|30|Cala tina sakhabisista agunera chayara dike
77|31|ye chaya sitala naya ebam ya raksa kare na agnisikha hate
77|32|niscaya jahannama utksepana karabe brhat sphulinga attalikatulya
77|33|ta yena pitabarna utera sreni [1]
77|34|sedina durbhoga mithyarupakaridera jan'ya.
77|35|Eta emana eka dina yedina na tara katha balabe [1]
77|36|ara na taderake anumati deya habe oyara pesa karara.
77|37|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|38|‘Eta'i phayasalara dina, amara ekatra karechi tomaderake ebam purbabartiderake.’
77|39|Atahpara tomadera kono kausala thakale ta prayoga kara amara birud'dhe [1].
77|40|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|41|Niscaya muttakira [1] thakabe chayaya o prasrabana bahula sthane
77|42|ara tadera banchita phalamulera pracuryera madhye.
77|43|‘Tomadera karmera puraskarasbarupa tomara trptira sathe panahara kara.’
77|44|Ebhabe amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
77|45|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|46|Tomara kha'o ebam bhoga kare na'o alpa kichudina, tomara to aparadhi [1].
77|47|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|48|Yakhana taderake bala haya, ruku kara takhana tara ruku kare na [1].
77|49|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|50|Kaje'i tara kura'anera paribarte ara kon kathaya imana anabe [1]
